thread.title: Lamar Odom found ‘unconscious’ at brothel after excessive partying
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom found ‘unconscious’ at brothel after excessive partying | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Lamar Odom found ‘unconscious’ at brothel after excessive partying
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Lamar Odom has been found unconscious at a brothel in Nevada after partying for days together.
A source at the Ranch said the 35-year-old basketball player was taking an herbal substitute for Viagra. Brothel owner Dennis Hof said that a woman went into Odom’s room in the VIP suites and found him unconscious, TMZ reports.
Thereafter, the woman began screaming for the manager and he called 911. The manager also found “mucus-type liquid coming out of his nose and mouth.”
The 35-year-old, who was married to Khloe Kardashian for four years, was taken to Pahrump hospital, where doctors intubated him and now he is being airlifted from the hospital to Las Vegas for more treatment.
A Kardashian family source revealed that the news is not shocking.
 14, 2015 9:58 pm
